name: Dragon Kingdoms VI
description:
The first new Dragon Kingdoms game in 15 years!

Following the footsteps of the first five Dragon Kingdoms games, Dragon Kingdoms VI has Kevin, a young man seek to become the sixth hero! But evil is rising... perhaps literally?

He'll need all the help he can get to stop this new evil before it has a chance to erase him from existence, as it permeates backwards through time!

Aaron, one of Kevin's friends joins him early on to even the odds. He loves climbing up to high places.

William, the towering but gentle giant, returns from Dragon Kingdoms V. More than his twelve-story stature makes him stand out, as he has the only thing that can take Kevin and his friends back in time!

Bowie, an archer that is said to have an aim that NEVER MISSES. While Kevin and Aaron are whiffling away, missing their target, Bowie can save the day even with fast enemies.  But, he feels those that are naughty don't deserve his assistance.

Darke, a mysterious ninja. She is said to only join those that aren't afraid to be a little naughty.
